sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import { Button, StyleSheet, Text, View } from "react-native";

const Calculatrice = () => {
    const [number, setNumber] = useState('');
    const styles = StyleSheet.create({
        main_container: {
            textAlign: "center",
            backgroundColor: "blue",
            alignItems: "center",
            justifyContent: "center", 
            width:"100%"
        }
    });

    return (
        <View>
            <View>
                <Text>{number}</Text>
            </View>

            <View style={{flexDirection:"row", flex:1}}>
               <View style={{flex:2}}>
                <Button title='1' onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(1))} />
               </View>
               <View style={{flex:2}}>
                <Button title='2' style={{flex:3}} onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(2))} />
               </View>
               <View style={{flex:2}}>
                <Button title='3' style={{flex:3}} onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(3))} />
               </View>
            </View>

            <View style={{flexDirection:"row", flex:1}}>
               <View style={{flex:2}}>
                <Button title='4' style={{flex:3}} onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(4))} />
               </View>
               <View style={{flex:3}}>
                <Button title='5' style={{flex:3}} onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(5))} />
               </View>
               <View style={{flex:3}}>
                <Button title='6' style={{flex:3}} onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(6))} />
               </View>
            </View>

            <View style={{flexDirection:"row", flex:1}}>
               <View style={{flex:3}}>
                <Button title='7' style={{flex:3}} onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(7))} />
               </View>
               <View style={{flex:3}}>
                <Button title='8' style={{flex:3}} onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(8))} />
               </View>
               <View style={{flex:3}}>
                <Button title='9' style={{flex:3}} onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(9))} />
               </View>
            </View>

            <View style={{flexDirection:"row", flex:1}}>
               <View style={{flex:3}}>
                <Button title='0' style={{flex:3}} onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(0))} />
               </View>
               <View style={{flex:3}}>
                <Button title='9' style={{flex:3}} onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(9))} />
               </View>
               <View style={{flex:3}}>
                <Button title='9' style={{flex:3}} onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(9))} />
               </View>
            </View>

            <View style={{flexDirection:"row", flex:1}}>
            <View style={{flex:3}}>
                <Button title='9' style={{flex:3}} onPress={() => setNumber(number.concat(9))} />
               </View>
            </View>
            <Button title='AC' onPress={() => setNumber('')}/>
        </View>
    );
};

export default Calculatrice;
